The claim states that a company is devel: grown chicken nugget made from feathers, but the expert's verdict clarifies that nuggets can be grown from cells collected from a feather, but the company JUST said that its first commercially available products won't use this method.
The expert: s verdict emphasizes that to make lab-grown meat, manufacturers start by collecting cells, which can be collected from a feather among other means. However, Just's head of communications clarified that their first products won't be produced from cells collected from a feather.
